title: cmd/godoc: Examples section should be after Index or default closed
body:
Visit http://golang.org/pkg/strings/

I have to scroll past the list of Examples to find out what functions are the package.
Until I know what's in the package the Examples don't really help me. I suggest moving
the Examples section in the heading after the Index section. If the Examples list must
stay where it is, then it should default to closed (hidden), requiring a click on the
toggle to show it.
